feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(python) Add stack trace to pickle error by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1286
  • feat(python): Clean traceback by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1288
  • fix: refresh oauth token for custom oauth connnection by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.17.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: return refresh token when creating a google connection by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1289
  • fix(python): github sdk correct name by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.17.1...v0.17.2

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(python): Traceback might contain non-pickleable code objects by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1292
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/open-policy-agent/opa from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1290

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.17.2...v0.17.3

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.17.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: make linear oauth actually use the actor var by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1295
  • feat(pyak): add linear client initialization by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1293

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.17.3...v0.17.4

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.17.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(systest): remove erronous exclusive by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1214
  • feat: suggest adding modules to requirements.txt message by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1299
  • feat: add downloadLog session service endpoint by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1297

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.17.4...v0.17.5
